title: Engineering Project-Based Learning: Virtual CVD Laboratory Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic engineering principles, chemistry knowledge, and understanding of fundamental experimental design
context.additional_context: Smartphone-Based Learning Environment, Real-Time Collaboration Tools, and Mid-Task Feedback-Centric Operation

learning_goals: Students understand core principles of semiconductor manufacturing processes and perform experimental designs three or more times in a virtual CVD laboratory.
Learners interpret experimental results with over 80% accuracy using data analysis tools and write engineering reports.
Participants evaluate problem-solving processes through weekly reflective journals and execute revision-improvement cycles at three or more levels.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
